settings.escapeHatchDescription: Force withdrawals via censorship resistant transactions on the settlement chain.

customTokenLists.name: Token list name
customTokenLists.disclaimer: Anyone can create any token, including fake versions of existing tokens. Take due care. Some tokens and their technical parameters may be incompatible with {{app}} services. By importing this custom token list you acknowledge and accept the risks.

activity.error:
Sorry! We're unable to pull your activity feed.
 Please try and refresh the page

tokens.customImportCheck: Make sure you have checked the token address and that it is correct:

recipient.sameAddressRequirement: Bridges to or from {{chain}} must have the same recipient address.

noGas.cctp: Bridging {{symbol}} requires an extra transaction on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this bridge.
noGas.opWithdrawing: Withdrawing requires 2 extra transactions on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this withdrawal.
noGas.arbWithdrawing: Withdrawing {{token}} requires an extra transaction on {{to}}. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} to complete this withdrawal.
noGas.depositing: Without gas on {{to}} you won't be able to make any transactions. Please top up {{gas}} on {{to}} before attempting this bridge.

extraTransactions.title: Transactions and wait times
extraTransactions.checkboxTitle: I understand and acknowledge the following:
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionSeconds_one: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} second.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionSeconds_other: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} seconds.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionMinutes_one: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minute.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionMinutes_other: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minutes.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionHours_one: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hour.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionHours_other: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hours.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionDays_one: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} day.
extraTransactions.cctpDescriptionDays_other: Bridging via CCTP requires an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} days.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalSeconds_one: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} second.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalSeconds_other: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} seconds.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalMinutes_one: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minute.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalMinutes_other: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minutes.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalHours_one: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hour.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalHours_other: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hours.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalDays_one: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} day.
extraTransactions.opWithdrawalDays_other: Native bridge withdrawals require 2 extra transactions on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} days.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalSeconds_one: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} second.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalSeconds_other: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} seconds.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalMinutes_one: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minute.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalMinutes_other: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} minutes.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalHours_one: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hour.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalHours_other: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} hours.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalDays_one: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} day.
extraTransactions.arbWithdrawalDays_other: Native bridge withdrawals require an extra transaction on {{to}} and a wait time of ~{{count}} days.
extraTransactions.checkbox1_one: I must complete an extra transaction on {{to}}
extraTransactions.checkbox1_other: I must complete 2 extra transactions on {{to}}
extraTransactions.checkbox2: Gas prices may fluctuate significantly between wait times and transactions
extraTransactions.checkbox3: A bridge cannot be sped up or cancelled once started

recipientSupportsNetwork.title: Make sure the wallet you're bridging to supports {{to}}
recipientSupportsNetwork.description: Check {{to}} support before your bridge or you may lose your crypto. Do not bridge to an exchange.
recipientSupportsNetwork.checkboxNotOwnWallet: The address I'm sending to supports {{to}}

expensiveGas.title: Expensive bridge
expensiveGas.description: This bridge will likely cost more in gas or fees than the value of the token bring bridged. Consider waiting until gas is cheaper or choose another route.

walletsDrawer.title: Wallets
walletsDrawer.svmDescription: Connect a Solana or SVM compatible wallet

tos.superbridge1: This interface is only a layer over the native bridge contracts for official Superchain rollups.
tos.superbridge2: No funds are held in custody by Superbridge at any point.
tos.superbridge3: For bridging help please head over to <0>support & FAQs</0>.
tos.superbridge4: By using this interface you agree to our <0>Terms and Privacy Policy</0>.
tos.dedicated1: This interface is only a layer over the native bridge contracts for <0>{{name}}</0>.
tos.forceReadTerms: Please read and agree to the Terms of Service
tos.forceReadPrivacy: Please read and agree to the Privacy Policy

feeModal.acrossFeeBreakdownDescription: Fees paid to <0>Across</0> liquidity providers and relayers
feeModal.hyperlaneFeeBreakdownDescription: Fees paid to <0>Hyperlane</0> relayers for message delivery
feeModal.lzFeeBreakdownDescription: Fees paid to <0>LayerZero</0> relayers for message delivery

gasInfoModal.title: Gas fees
gasInfoModal.description: With blockchains you need to pay a fee to submit transactions. Transactions submitted to {{from}} require a small amount of {{symbol}} to ensure they're confirmed by the network.
gasInfoModal.opWithdrawal: Withdrawals from OP Stack rollups require two extra transactions to prove & finalize the withdrawal on the settlement chain.
gasInfoModal.arbWithdrawal: Withdrawals from Arbitrum Nitro rollups require an extra transaction to finalize on the settlement chain.
gasInfoModal.cctp: Native USDC bridges via CCTP require an extra transaction on the destination chain.
